price: (47) No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
